import React,{Component} from "react"; import UserAppBar from "./UserAppBar"; import Footer from "./Footer"; class ApplyJob extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state={ job_id:null, isLoading:false, job_details:[] } this.setState({job_id:this.props.match.params.id}); } componentDidMount(){ this.setState({isLoading: true}); fetch('/greata/job_details.php?id='+this.props.match.params.id,{ method:'GET', headers:{'content-type': 'application/json;charset=UTF-8'}, } ) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => this.setState({isLoading:false,job_details:data})); } render(){ return(
{/* form start */}
Key word Job title,Company name
Country
{/* form end */} {/* search result */}
Job Title: {this.state.job_details}
Full type: Full time
First name
Last name
Email
Phone number
Sex
Age
High level of Education
Year of expirience in field
Location

Willignes to travel
Willignes to travel
Language & levels


Licenses & certificates


Starting date
Upload Documents
{/* form to apply */} {/* end form to apply */}
advert
{/* end of search result */}
{/* footer */}
{/* end of footer */}
) } } export default ApplyJob
